reviewText: I remember this wacky show on cable.  Amazing that it's still around on video.
It's a crazy public access show that's nasty, funny and strange. The host is funny and there are people from all areas of showbusiness saying weird s*** about porn.

Colin's Sleazy Friends was a very guilty pleasure.  Colin was the worlds most open host with no professional training and absolutely no boundaries. You could tell watching him, that he often didn't know what he was going to say as he said it.  No filter at all.  The women (and also the dudes) were all very funny and were inspired by Colin and Dino's 'anything for fun' attitude.  I was working nights during this era and so many times we'd schedule our dinners around Colin's episodes on LA cable.

If you enjoy seeing adult actresses be as real as they can be (within the bounds of cable access decency), then you'll enjoy this. If you are the type that likes to write angry letters to sponsors and tell others what they should and shouldn't watch, you might not want to purchase this.

Don't purchase this if you enjoy wearing socks because they'll be knocked off.

Overall, this DVD set rocks.  Enjoy the cheap sets, bad lighting and cable access flavor.  Come for the porn stars, stay for Colin.  Wait a minute, that sounds bad.  You know what I mean.

Enjoy!
The show was great when it was airing wednesday mornings at 3:30am in LA on the cable access. Great to see some of it's survived on DVD. Great gift for the grandparents! XXX
